subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2016)
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: United States Coach Jill Ellis will have to refine the lineup for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, where the national team will have 18 players compared with 23 at the World Cup.
snippet: United States Coach Jill Ellis will have to refine the lineup for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, where the national team will have 18 players compared with 23 at the World Cup.
